overview: A certified public accountant with extensive experience working with start-up and high growth technology companies. He most recently served as CFO for ReliableRemodeler.com, Inc a company with annual revenues of $10 million. Prior to that, he was CFO for Chrome Systems & Automotive Lease Guides (ALG), Inc which had annual revenues of $24 million. Mr. Heynderickx was instrumental in the successful sale of both companies in 2006 and 2008 respectively.
